milestones.description: Viv Richards has become the top scorer for WI in ODIs with 574 runs, going past Greenidge's 479
Viv Richards has scored 2 hundreds in ODIs, the most for WI breaking Haynes's record
This is the highest match aggregate (480) involving teams England & West Indies in ODIs
Derek Randall has broken the record for most catches (10) in ODIs, going past Clive Lloyd's 9
West Indies's 93-run win against England is the largest margin of victory in terms of runs in ODIs, beating 50-run win against England
Dickie Bird has broken the record for officiating the most ODIs (15) as an umpire, going past Constant
Viv Richards and Collis King's 139-run partnership is the highest for the 5th wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 92 between Alvin Kallicharran and Viv Richards
Clive Lloyd has broken the record for playing the most ODIs (16) for WI, going past Deryck Murray
Viv Richards and Collis King's 139-run partnership is WI's highest for the 5th wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 92 between Alvin Kallicharran and Viv Richards

stories.title: I saw Richards in his prime
stories.seoTitle: Jon Hotten - Getting nostalgic over the '79 World Cup
stories.summary: Watching Garner, Richards and King punish England left a young fan awestruck at Lord's

image.caption: Viv Richards on his way to a World Cup-winning century
image.longCaption: Viv Richards on his way to a World Cup-winning century, England v West Indies, World Cup final, Lord's, 23 June, 1979

stories.title: Kings for a day
stories.subTitle: Essay
stories.seoTitle: Russell Jackson on players made by the World Cup
stories.summary: There are great players and then there are players who are great for World Cups

stories.title: ENGLAND v WEST INDIES
stories.subTitle: Prudential World Cup 1979, final
stories.summary: West Indies won by 92 runs and so retained the Prudential Cup and the title of world champions which they first won in 1975

videos.title: Big Bird sinks England
